email.title: In Case You Missed Us – Next Jump is Hiring!
email.text:
Thank you everyone who visited our stall yesterday during the Sponsors’ Exhibition. We really enjoyed talking to everyone and answering the questions that you had. We also ran a Next Jump Logo Challenge which wewill be announcing the winner in the DocSoc newsletter this week.
## Who are we?
Next Jump is a global tech company with an award-winning culture. We help to transform companies from all sectors (Finance, Tech, Military) to build high performing teams; and our E-commerce platform is used by 70% of the Fortune 1000 (including Facebook, Bloomberg and the BBC) making $2B in sales a year. Over the last 12 months, our core and social businesses have been growing rapidly. We are looking for developers who want to design, build and market amazing mobile apps and web platforms- built with React Native, Go, PHP, Vue.js, AWS and more - to our 3 million UK customers from their first day on the job.
We're offering a fast-track interview for those of you who apply to us by midnight **23rd October** - catch our interest and we'll chat to you, send you a coding test and invite you to our Super Saturday assessment da, which will be held at the end of this year!
We are looking to fill the vacancies in our Intern Class 2021 as well as Graduate Class 2021.
## Apply Now!
If you are looking for a 'not-your-typical graduate job/internship', then Next Jump's the place for you!
* Software Engineers: https://nextjump.applytojob.com/apply/UWulrrsRCG/Software-Engineer-Web-Applications?source=icl-mail-blast * Business Associates: https://nextjump.applytojob.com/apply/WIEYayG7YQ/Business-Associate?source=icl-mail-blast
